channel.title: Need IP hanged on Status List
channel.description: Changed my dedi, need IP Changed

item.title: Need IP hanged on Status List
item.dc:creator: @Lubelube Lubelube
item.description:
@Lubelube wrote:

deathschaos9:

The only person who can change your IP is Moparisthebest and he doesn’t do it for anybody. You’ll just have to wait for your uptime to drop to 40%… When that happens your server will be removed from the status list and you can repost it.

Smh, every other toplist you can change the IP.

:fp:

Read full topic

item.title: Need IP hanged on Status List
item.dc:creator: @Lubelube Lubelube
item.description:
@Lubelube wrote:

Well I dont know how. And it doesnt let me? there is no option…
Address is 62.75.204.96
need it changed to
69.64.46.27

item.title: Need IP hanged on Status List
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Lubelube, post:3, topic:432379”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=535090.msg3912073#msg3912073 date=1328840337]
… and this is why using a hostname from No-IP would be a good idea.
[/quote]
True, but I cant use it on Linux[/quote]

Yes you can.

Also, you should be able to change the IP on the edit page for your server. Telling us you need it changed, and expecting us to change it, without even knowing the address, is very crass of you.

Read full topic
